allow: Bash(curl -X POST http://localhost:3002/api/chat -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""messages"":[{""role"":""user"",""content"":""Mi email correcto es suporte@stealthify.ai""}],""customerEmail"":""test@example.com""}")

Bash(curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3002/api/chat -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""messages"":[{""role"":""user"",""content"":""Mi email es suporte@stealthify.ai""}],""customerEmail"":""test@example.com""}")

Bash(curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3002/api/chat -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""messages"":[{""role"":""user"",""content"":""oi, quais são meus pedidos?""}],""customerEmail"":""jefersoncemep@gmail.com""}")

Bash(curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3002/api/chat -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""messages"":[{""role"":""user"",""content"":""oi, quais são meus pedidos?""},{""role"":""assistant"",""content"":""Tenés 5 pedidos""},{""role"":""user"",""content"":""pedido 23714 já tem rastreamento?""}],""customerEmail"":""jefersoncemep@gmail.com""}")
